mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (empNum, empName, pw, job, phoneNum, annualLeaveNum,workDate,birthDate, adminNum, authNum, deptNum) VALUES (empNum_seq.NEXTVAL, #{empName},#{pw}, #{job}, #{phoneNum}, #{annualLeaveNum}, #{workDate},#{birthDate}, #{adminNum}, #{authNum}, #{deptNum})

INSERT INTO employees (leaveNum, leaveType, leaveReason, proposalDate, startDate, endDate,leaveGrantDay) VALUES (leaveNum_seq.NEXTVAL, #{empName},#{pw}, #{job}, #{phoneNum}, #{annualLeaveNum}, #{workDate},#{birthDate}, #{adminNum}, #{authNum}, #{deptNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE leave SET leaveGrantDay=#{leaveDay} WHERE leaveNum =1
UPDATE leave SET leaveNumSet=#{annualNum} WHERE leaveNum =1
mapper.select: SELECT leaveGrantDay FROM Leave WHERE leaveNum =1
SELECT leaveNumSet FROM Leave WHERE leaveNum =1
mapper.update: UPDATE employees SET annualLeaveNum = CASE WHEN hireDate <= SYSDATE - 365 THEN CASE WHEN hireDate <= SYSDATE - 1095 THEN LEAST(25, (#{annualNum}+1) + FLOOR(((SYSDATE - hireDate - 1095) / 730))) ELSE LEAST(#{annualNum}) END ELSE CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-MM-DD') = #{leaveDay} THEN (#{annualNum}) ELSE FLOOR(months_between(SYSDATE, hireDate)) END END WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-MM-DD') = #{leaveDay}
